Your WEX FlexCard Application is Approved - Order Your Cards Today!
Welcome to the WEX FlexCard Program
Congratulations! You've been approved for a new WEX FlexCard account with a monthly credit limit of $1000. Now you are on your way to simplifying your business practices and saving money.
Next step: create an online account and order your cardsfollowing these two easy steps:
Register for FlexOnline using your application number: 1-XXXXXX Registration is easy — Watch this quick guide. Order your cards on FlexOnline. Learn how to add cards and more in our quick video tutorial.
Additional Online Registration Details:
• If you specified a billing coordinator on your application, use his/her name and email address for online registration. • Otherwise, enter the application signer's name and email address exactly as entered on the application.
